text: Race Horses are an indie/pop band from Aberystwyth, Wales. They started in 2005 as Radio Luxembourg. Its members were Meilyr Jones, Dylan Hughes, Gwion Llewelyn and Alun Gaffey. They split in 2012. ==References== Category:2005 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2012 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:British pop music groups Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2012 Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:Welsh musical groups Category:2000s establishments in Wales
title: Race Horses (band)
